title: English Foreign Language Instructors
description:
Lapu-lapu Cebu International College (LCIC) is a newly-opened educational institution located in Bankal, Lapu-Lapu City that caters to local & international students with a specific, stand alone Center for English Language Studies (CELS).

We are currently recruiting English Foreign Language (EFL) instructors to assist in our endeavor as a young, rapidly growing higher-ed institute delivering high-quality, active EFL learning to Asian international university students. The language instructor will also be required to contribute to the creation, implementation, review, & assessment of English language curricula.

**Qualifications:**

* Current PRC License required
* Bachelor’s degree in teaching English, Linguistics or related field
* English foreign/second language (EFL/ESL) instruction is a necessity
* Excellent organizational & English communication skills
* Creative, collaborative, outside the box approach to EFL teaching & learning
* Classroom technology & software application proficiency
* Google Drive, Canva, Kahoot!, Quizlet, Padlet, Actionbound, Microsoft, etc.
* Experience teaching students from diverse cultural & academic backgrounds
* Knowledge, understanding, & experience in active learning, student-centered facilitation, as well as project/problem-based learning (PBL)

**Preferred:**

* Knowledge of CEFR curriculum is an advantage
* Trainer’s Methodology 1 (TM 1) certificate is an advantage
* Master’s degree in English, Linguistics, TESOL, or Education is preferred
* Full-time English language instruction experience in the tertiary level preferred

**Roles:**

* Plans, designs, & implements CEFR aligned instructional lessons & materials based on sound, current, & relevant English Language teaching methodologies
* Effectively implement & manage engaging, student-centered tasks & activities
* Implement & monitor authentic assessment of student progress
* Motivate & engage students to confidently use English in various settings
* Conducts English lessons & activities beyond traditional or general English contexts through ESP, Filipino Culture, Sustainable Development Goals, Skills Development, Public Speaking & Presentations, etc.
* Actively participate in ongoing curriculum & professional skills development & improvement by staying active in ongoing opportunity for personal, professional, & departmental improvement
* Be flexible to adapt to the ever-changing needs of a start-up college
* Collaborative, creative, inclusive, supportive, forward-thinking team player

**Compensation Package:**

* Competitive salary commensurate with qualifications starting at Php 26,000/mo.
* Health coverage
* Leave benefits
* On-going professional development, workshop, & Skill Share opportunities

**To apply for the position please submit the following:**

* Cover Letter highlighting your teaching philosophy & suitability for the post;
* Curriculum Vitae (CV), updated with relevant information including recent passport-sized photo, full educational & employment history starting from high school graduation to present;
* Details of two professional acquaintances prepared to act as referees;
* A list of any research publications; and
* Be prepared to create a **40-minute lesson plan** for **CEFR A1-A2 level learners** on a topic of your choice. The plan should include ***lesson goals & objectives, activity details, activity purpose, lesson progression, & approximate timings***

***If shortlisted, the candidate is invited for an interview and a demo-teaching of the 40-minute lesson plan prepared.***

**Candidates should be able to start as soon as possible.**
